meta.name: Francisco Turdera
meta.title: Cloud & Solutions Engineer | Specializing in Automation and Cost Optimization

titles.text: Cloud & Solutions Engineer | Specializing in Automation and Cost Optimization
AI & Automation Engineer | LLM Integration and Agentic Systems
Pre-Sales Solutions Engineer | Cloud Infrastructure and Healthcare IT

summaries.text: Solutions Engineer recognized for cutting cloud costs by 44% and building automated deployment pipelines that reduced provisioning time by 80%. Focused on designing scalable systems, automating deployments, and driving standardization across global demo environments through data-driven collaboration.

Engineer and AI builder with hands-on experience shipping production LLM integrations — from multi-client AI phone receptionists to autonomous assistant platforms with real-time monitoring and Google Workspace integration. Combines deep backend and cloud infrastructure expertise with a track record of building agentic systems from the ground up.

Pre-Sales and Solutions Engineer with a track record of translating complex technical systems into compelling demos and customer-specific deployments. Experienced bridging sales and engineering teams across healthcare IT and cloud environments, with proven results in cost reduction and deployment automation.

cloud_infrastructure: Azure (App Services, VMs, Logic Apps, Active Directory, Functions, NSG)

bullets.text: Cut demo systems cost by $230k annually (44%) and resource utilization (CPU/RAM) by 50% through Azure Savings Plans and infrastructure optimization.
Reduced deployment time from 5 hours to ~1 hour by parallelizing custom Azure CLI scripts.
Designed modular, on-demand demo architecture to avoid unnecessary VM deployments.
Built an IP-restricted Static Web App + Logic Apps to automate provisioning, deployment, and shutdown.
Partnered with sales engineers to design tailored demo environments for customer-specific workflows.
Maintained >98% uptime across mission-critical healthcare systems under tight SLAs.
Delivered real-time technical support for mission-critical healthcare systems.
Acted as a bridge between clients and developers, translating business needs into actionable technical specs.
Improved personalization algorithms, increasing user retention by 12%.
Migrated monolith architecture to microservices, improving systems performance and maintainability.
Owned high-impact features including Daily Drive, The Get Up, and On Record.
Standardized data pipelines and automated workflows with Slack visibility for real-time monitoring.
Automated AWS provisioning via CLI scripts, reducing setup time from 20 to 2 minutes.

projects.name: AI Receptionist for Restaurants & Bars
projects.description: Built a multi-client AI phone receptionist that answers calls naturally, books tables, and retrieves info through a custom MCP Python server on Railway, improving call flow speed and realism.

projects.name: WhatsApp AI Real Estate Agent
projects.description: Designed and deployed an AI assistant integrated with a real-estate CRM and WhatsApp, automating property recommendations for potential clients through REST APIs and GPT. Built for modular scalability and multi-client deployment across cloud environments.

projects.name: Lilo — Personal AI Assistant Platform
projects.description: Built a production AI assistant platform featuring autonomous background monitoring (Heartbeat tasks), Google Workspace integration, multi-model routing between Claude and GPT, and persistent identity management. Runs as an always-on personal server with Telegram as the primary interface. Designed with isolated enterprise and personal instances.

projects.name: Trading Bot
projects.description: Developed a trading bot exploiting market-open volatility with risk control and backtesting.

projects.name: Smart Watch Prototype
projects.description: Built a smartwatch featuring a digital level, theremin, and notifications to explore sensor integration.

projects.name: Resume Tailoring Pipeline
projects.description: Built an end-to-end CLI tool that scrapes job postings, sends them with a master resume to Claude for AI-powered tailoring, and generates a polished ATS-friendly DOCX — automating the entire resume customization workflow.

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science and Mathematics
